metadata.title: CVE-2024-26632 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:block: Fix iterating over an empty bio with bio_for_each_folio_allIf the bio contains no data, bio_first_folio() calls page_folio() on aNULL pointer and oopses.  Move the test that we've reached the end ofthe bio from bio_next_folio() to bio_first_folio().[axboe: add unlikely() to error case]

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
